original_body_lines: The Joint Postal Trade Union Alliance staged a protest outside the Central Mail Exchange against the escalating cost of living, new tax policy. They urged the authorities to provide them with cost of living allowance of Rs. 20,000. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
Front held a protest in front of the Central Post Exchange at noon today (3).
The postal workers protested there by displaying placards stating that due to the economic crisis in the country, the people have become unable to live.pix Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
